name: open_account_menu
description: Opens the account menu to access account-related options.

name: perform_search
description: Initiates a search action using text or voice input.
parameters: {'search_type': 'What type of search would you like to perform? [Text search, Voice search]'}

name: perform_camera_search
description: Initiates a search using the camera feature.

name: navigate_to_section
description: Navigates to a specific section within the app.
parameters: {'section': 'Which section would you like to navigate to? [Discover, Search, Collections, More]'}
